WorkItem.Description:
I am using PHPExcel lib with yii and when i am trying to upload old version of xls file then its giving error like below now i am not able to understand why its giving this issue. i try to debug the issue what i got is that below code giving me html output of the file i uploaded

$objPHPExcel = new PHPExcel();
$inputFileType = PHPExcel_IOFactory::identify($file);
below is error
DOMDocument::loadHTMLFile(): Unexpected end tag : tbody in file_to_upload.xls, line: 30 

now i can't resist users to upload old version of files what would be the solution for this.

one more thing is if i uncomment the below code

$inputFileType = ($inputFileType == 'HTML') ? strtoupper(pathinfo($file, PATHINFO_EXTENSION)) : $inputFileType;

then i am getting below error

include(PHPExcel_Reader_XLS.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory 

what sould i do please suggest me.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel: error with old version xls files
